LightningMessageChannel.description: This is a message channel used by custom components to trigger actions registered on sfpegActionBarCmp components.

lightningMessageFields.description: Segmentation of the communication channel, to segregate the different sfpegActionBarCmp targets (active tab context only).
Configuration of the Action to be executed by the target sfpegActionBarCmp component(s).
Context data to be used when executing the action (optional).
